pageProduct.name: Aveeno Skin Relief Moisture Repair Cream 311g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

AVEENO® Skin Relief Repair Cream 311g

Aveeno Skin Relief Intense Moisture Repair Cream for Very Dry Skin helps to restore and maintain the moisture barrier of extra-dry skin.

This deeply moisturising cream provides effective, long-lasting moisturisation to help relieve extra-dry skin. The body moisturiser's proprietary formula, which combines ceramide, rich emollients and a Triple Oat Complex, deeply moisturises to help restore and maintain healthy-looking skin. 


  • Helps restore and maintain skin's moisture barrier

  • Intensively hydrating moisturiser providing skin with 24-hour moisturisation

  • Helps prevent moisture loss and helps repair extra-dry skin.

  • Non-comedogenic

  • Fragrance free and no cortisone

  • Contains natural colloidal oatmeal


AVEENO® Active Naturals® Are ingredients derived from nature and uniquely formulated to reveal skin's natural health and beauty.

Size: 311g

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

KEY FEATURES

• Helps Restore Extra Dry Skin
• Fragrance Free
• Dermatologist Recommended Brand
• Intense Moisture
• Repair Cream




Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Distearyldimonium Chloride,Petrolatum, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Oil, Avena Sativa (Oat) kernel Extract, Ceramide NP, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Benzyl Alcohol, Methylparaben, Steareth-20, Sodium Chloride.

Directions

Smooth generously over body.
